lead_paragraph: Infighting among the federal officials in charge of the cleanup of the Savannah River nuclear site in South Carolina is so severe that it threatens to undermine public confidence in their work, a federal watchdog warned.
snippet: Infighting among the federal officials in charge of the cleanup of the Savannah River nuclear site in South Carolina is so severe that it threatens to undermine public confidence in their work, a federal watchdog warned.

headline.main: Report Cites Crippling Infighting at Nuclear Site
headline.seo: Infighting Cripples Savannah River Site Project, Report Finds
headline.print_headline: Report Cites Crippling Infighting at A-Plant
